mapper.select: SELECT restaurant_id, address, type, name, main_menu FROM( select row_number() over (order by restaurant_id) as seq, restaurant_id, address, type, name, main_menu from restaurant ) where seq between #{start} and #{end} order by restaurant_id
mapper.insert: insert into restaurant (restaurant_id, region, type, main_menu, name, address, phone_number) values(restaurant_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{region}, #{type},#{mainMenu},#{name},#{address},#{phoneNumber})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, update_date=sysdate WHERE board_id=#{boardId} and password=#{password}
